entry.title: The Twins
entry.summary:
Author: TMRCookie

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 8,135Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 98

Summary: "Hey, where are you? There is a pack meeting." Scott asked."Scotty, something came up.""What?" Scott asked again."They found him." There was silence on the other side of line."You mean they found...""Yeah. They found Thomas." Stiles said.Stiles was living his life when he got a call, one that he wished but never thought would happen. They found his brother.Thomas woke up in a town in Beacon Hills, finding out that he has a family, even more so, a twin brother.Also posted on Wattpad @TMRBrownie

entry.title: Renaissance in ruins
entry.summary:
Author: am0ra

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 14,207Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 66

Summary: Stiles returns to Beacon Hills after years of disappearance. He brings with him a child, but something is different. His presence is marked by a silent pain, a weight that the pack can't ignore.Derek quickly notices that Stiles is no longer the same. There’s something in his behavior, in his gaze, that hides a dark past. But what happened to him? What is he trying to hide?The pack, still hurt by Stiles' sudden departure, doesn’t know how to deal with his return. Stiles’ secrets begin to surface, and with them, a truth no one expected.And, in the midst of it all, Derek starts to wonder: is what happened to Stiles something that can be healed? Or is he already lost forever?

entry.title: Iron Gilded Void
entry.summary:
Author: DaisyBeats

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 32,991Chapters: 7/?Kudos: 358

Summary: Things fall apart for Stiles in Beacon Hills and he and the Hale men in his life end up with his uncles in New York City. "Guys, it's fine," Stiles said, stepping forward. "Stiles, it’s not fine!" Derek snapped, not taking his eyes off James. "Do you fucking know who that is?!" Stiles blinked at him, then at Peter, whose entire body was coiled so tightly he looked ready to launch himself at James at any second. With a sigh, Stiles rubbed his face. “Yes. That’s Uncle James.”

entry.title: Designation 19621
entry.summary:
Author: fanficreader5

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 11,497Chapters: 4/19Kudos: 115

Summary: “My designation is 19621, sir.”   Stiles stares at him.   “That's quite the mouthful. Any chance you have a, like, normal name?”   “Derek,” the cleaner says eventually. He looks at the red button on the wall and then glances away.  Stiles follows his gaze and blanches. “Dude, I’m not gonna shock you for telling me your name.”_____The new werewolf cleaner for Stiles' PhD group is grumpy and aloof and maybe a genius. As Stiles gets to know him, he can't help but wonder if there's any way to get that collar off him.

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 13,478Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 18

Summary: Stiles comes from a hunter family, and for the last decade, he's spent his summers training to become the perfect killer. All that's left is to get high school over with and be officially initiated into the clan. Of course, he doesn't count on almost dying in the woods, or on being rescued by one of the werewolves his family is sworn to kill.Derek has been on the run with his sisters since hunters burned down his home and everyone in it. entry.title: Morning Dew
entry.summary:
Author: Samandiriel (kyra516)

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 51,956Chapters: 10/11Kudos: 242

Summary: Stiles had always been a bit of an odd bunny compared to his peers. He had this sense of adventure and the need to explore! His father said he got most of it from his late mother. His father also called it recklessness and lack of self-preservation. Most of the time, Stiles just dismissed his father as being plain wrong.Today however? Today he reckoned his father was completely and truly right in his judgement. Because today, Stiles had made the most reckless and stupid decision of his life. You see, Stiles had the brilliant idea of venturing into wolf lands to do some gathering, and so here he was, on the other side of the river, in the unknown lands that no bunny before him had dared to venture into. What could possibly go wrong?It was all Jackson's fault anyway.

Summary: Derek is brought back to life by our favorite FBI-agent, Stiles Stilinski.They have sex and Derek gets pregnant.A story about Derek and Stiles building their family and trying to find their way to each other.orStiles was looking at him expectedly.Derek took a deep breath and prepared himself for the upcoming words. “But I wasn’t the only one he smelled like, Stiles.”He looked pleadingly at Stiles, who'd gone deathly pale, and was now shaking his head.“Stiles-, Eli is your son.” Derek forced out.Stiles let out a small breathless sound of “Oh!”He shot up from the couch and took his head between his hands, pulling his hair.When that didn’t help to quiet the raging flood of questions in his head, he started pacing.“What? -I mean…how? How is that even possible?""Why the hell would you keep that from me?” He was spluttering.Stiles couldn’t believe what he was hearing. Why would Derek do that?

entry.title: Sparked: Part 1
entry.summary:
Author: HitopCub

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 226,307Chapters: 17/44Kudos: 29

Summary: After The Alignment - a cosmic therapy session led by his and Derek's future son from an alternate reality - Stiles Stilinski's latent spark abilities are awakened. Now he's diving into his first six months of magical training with a prestigious coven, hidden on the 13th floor of a Silicon Valley tech giant.Stiles navigates a world where cutting-edge tech meets ancient magic. He's juggling unpredictable spark powers, bonding with fellow apprentices, and trying not to spill interdimensional secrets (like being married to Derek in another reality). Meanwhile, he's nurturing dreams of opening an apothecary in Beacon Hills.But it's not all cinnamon rolls and spell books. A sinister presence is sabotaging Stiles' training, and rumors of a spy threaten to tear the coven apart. Stiles must unravel these mysteries while mastering his abilities and grappling with growing feelings for Derek.With help from old and new friends, Stiles faces challenges that will shape his future as a spark. "Sparked: Part 1" is a tale of magic, mayhem, and coming-of-age, proving that in six months, anything can happen - especially when you're a spark-in-training with a knack for trouble and a head full of secrets.
